block.p: Suzanne Christine Wiseman, a daughter of Dolores P. Wiseman of Garden City, L.I., and Richard F. Wiseman of Sherman, Conn., was married yesterday to Thomas Francis Ryan, a son of Anne J. Ryan of Riverdale, the Bronx, and the late John J. Ryan. The Rev. James Kuntz officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Anne in Garden City.

Mrs. Ryan, 31, graduated from Manhattan College. She is a publications editor in the technology department of the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company in New York. Her father is the president and chief operating officer of its subsidiary Metlife International Holdings, which monitors the insurer's overseas operations. Her mother was until recently the East Coast vice president of Creditcard Sentinel, a promotions company, in Garden City. The bride is a stepdaughter of Nancy Wiseman of New York.

Suzanne Christine Wiseman, a daughter of Dolores P. Wiseman of Garden City, L.I., and Richard F. Wiseman of Sherman, Conn., was married yesterday to Thomas Francis Ryan, a son of Anne J. Ryan of Riverdale, the Bronx, and the late John J. Ryan. The Rev. James Kuntz officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Anne in Garden City.

Mrs. Ryan, 31, graduated from Manhattan College. She is a publications editor in the technology department of the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company in New York. Her father is the president and chief operating officer of its subsidiary Metlife International Holdings, which monitors the insurer's overseas operations. Her mother was until recently the East Coast vice president of Creditcard Sentinel, a promotions company, in Garden City. The bride is a stepdaughter of Nancy Wiseman of New York.

Mr. Ryan, 29, is a lawyer who practices in New York and Cape Town. He graduated from Kenyon College and received his law degree from Washington University in St. Louis. His mother is the deputy to the vice president for finance of the City University of New York. His father was a business agent for the Metal Lathers Union in New York.
